generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and tram tracks, which is the primary surface for vehicle movement.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian areas are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and trees.
- building: Numerous buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial establishments and residential structures.
- vegetation: Trees are prominently visible along the sidewalks and in front of buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible in the background between the buildings, appearing clear and bright.
- person: A person is visible walking on the road, pushing a stroller.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along both sides of the road and some are in motion.
- bus: A yellow public transport bus is visible in the distance, traveling on the road.
- train: The tram tracks on the road indicate the presence of a tram system, although no tram is visible in the image.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the right side of the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a parking ticket machine sign on the right side of the road.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at intersections in the distance.
- rider: A person is visible riding a bicycle on the right side of the road.
